Uses of Class
com.accele.gage.Registry

  • Packages that use Registry 
    Package Description
    com.accele.gage
    Contains the core components of the General Abstracted Game Engine.
    com.accele.gage.control
    Contains classes for receiving input from the user, primarily involving mouse and keyboard support.
    com.accele.gage.gfx
    Contains classes used to display graphics to the screen.

    • Uses of Registry in com.accele.gage

      Methods in com.accele.gage that return Registry 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Registry<Animation> GAGE.getAnimationRegistry()
      Returns the Registry used by GAGE for registering instances of Animation.
      Registry<Configuration> GAGE.getConfigurationRegistry()
      Returns the Registry used by GAGE for registering instances of Configuration.
      Registry<ControlListener> GAGE.getControlListenerRegistry()
      Returns the Registry used by GAGE for registering instances of ControlListener.

      Returns the Registry used by GAGE for registering instances of Font.

      Returns the Registry used by GAGE for registering instances of KeyListener.
      Registry<Model> GAGE.getModelRegistry()
      Returns the Registry used by GAGE for registering instances of Model.
      Registry<MouseListener> GAGE.getMouseListenerRegistry()
      Returns the Registry used by GAGE for registering instances of MouseListener.
      Registry<Shader> GAGE.getShaderRegistry()
      Returns the Registry used by GAGE for registering instances of Shader.
      Registry<SoundBuffer> GAGE.getSoundBufferRegistry()
      Returns the Registry used by GAGE for registering instances of SoundBuffer.

      Returns the Registry used by GAGE for registering instances of SoundSource.

      Returns the Registry used by GAGE for registering instances of GameState.
      Registry<Texture> GAGE.getTextureRegistry()
      Returns the Registry used by GAGE for registering instances of Texture.

      Returns the Registry used by GAGE for registering instances of TileMap.
